headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Ecolab Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Ecolab has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Ecolab Stock Will Climb or Sink?
raw.summary: Ecolab has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Does ECL’s Rally Still Have Room After Strong Q1 Earnings in 2025?
summary: If you are considering what to do with Ecolab stock right now, you are not alone. The company’s shares have been on a slow but steady climb, catching the eye of investors looking for quality in a defensive sector. Over the past year, Ecolab returned 16%, and the gains look even better on a longer timeline. Over three years, the stock is up an impressive 71%. That kind of growth can make a long-term holder feel vindicated, especially when many other stocks have been wobbling. More recently,...
